com.kevalpatel.ringtonepicker

Class RingtoneUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kevalpatel.ringtonepicker.RingtoneUtils

  • public final class RingtoneUtils
extends Object
    Created by Keval on 20-Feb-17. This class contains utility classes for the ringtone.
    Author:
    'https://github.com/kevalpatel2106'

    • Method Detail

      • getRingTone

        @NonNull
 @CheckResult
static LinkedHashMap<String,Uri> getRingTone(@NonNull
                                                                    Context context)
        Load the list of all the ringtone registered using RingtoneManager. It will add title as the key and uri of the sound as value in given LinkedHashMap.
        Parameters:
        context - instance of the caller.
        Returns:
        LinkedHashMap of the title-Uri pair of all the ringtone.

      • getNotificationTones

        @NonNull
 @CheckResult
static LinkedHashMap<String,Uri> getNotificationTones(@NonNull
                                                                             Context context)
        Load the list of all the notification tones registered using RingtoneManager. It will add title as the key and uri of the sound as value in given LinkedHashMap.
        Parameters:
        context - instance of the caller.
        Returns:
        LinkedHashMap of the title-Uri pair of all the notification tone.

      • getAlarmTones

        @NonNull
 @CheckResult
static LinkedHashMap<String,Uri> getAlarmTones(@NonNull
                                                                      Context context)
        Load the list of all the alarm tones registered using RingtoneManager. It will add title as the key and uri of the sound as value in given LinkedHashMap.
        Parameters:
        context - instance of the caller.
        Returns:
        LinkedHashMap of the title-Uri pair of all the alarm tone.

      • getTone

        @CheckResult
 @NonNull
private static LinkedHashMap<String,Uri> getTone(@NonNull
                                                                        Context context,
                                                                        int type)
        Get the tone from RingtoneManager for any given type. It will add title as the key and uri of the sound as value in given LinkedHashMap.
        Parameters:
        context - instance of the caller
        type - type of the ringtone from RingtonePickerDialog.Builder.TYPE_NOTIFICATION, RingtonePickerDialog.Builder.TYPE_RINGTONE or RingtonePickerDialog.Builder.TYPE_ALARM.
        Returns:
        LinkedHashMap of the title-Uri pair of all the ringtone of given type.

      • getMusic

        @NonNull
 @CheckResult
static LinkedHashMap<String,Uri> getMusic(@NonNull
                                                                 Context context)
        Get the list of the music (sound) files from the phone storage. It will add title as the key and uri of the sound as value in given LinkedHashMap.
        Parameters:
        context - instance of the caller.
        Returns:
        LinkedHashMap of the title-Uri pair of all the music tracks.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If storage read permission is not available.

      • getSystemRingtoneTone

        @Nullable
public static Uri getSystemRingtoneTone()
        Get the system selected default ringtone.
        Returns:
        Uri of the selected ringtone. You may need android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission to read the ringtone selected from the external storage.

      • getSystemAlarmTone

        @Nullable
public static Uri getSystemAlarmTone()
        Get the system selected default alarm tone.
        Returns:
        Uri of the selected alarm tone. You may need android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission to read the ringtone selected from the external storage.

      • getSystemNotificationTone

        @Nullable
public static Uri getSystemNotificationTone()
        Get the system selected default notification tone.
        Returns:
        Uri of the selected notification tone. You may need android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission to read the ringtone selected from the external storage.

      • getRingtoneName

        @Nullable
public static String getRingtoneName(@NonNull
                                               Context context,
                                               @NonNull
                                               Uri uri)
        Get the title of the ringtone from the uri of ringtone.
        Parameters:
        context - instance of the caller
        uri - uri of the tone to search
        Returns:
        title of the tone or return null if no tone found.

      • checkForStorageReadPermission

        static boolean checkForStorageReadPermission(@NonNull
                                             Context context)
        Check if the Manifest.permission#WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission is granted?
        Returns:
        True if the read permission granted or else false.
